stunned.description: You lose an action and cannot act effectively.

poisoned.description: Toxins weaken you, reducing health regeneration.

energized.description: Adrenaline surges granting you an extra action.

angry.description: Rage clouds your judgment, slowing deliberate actions.

bleed.description: Open wounds cause you to lose health over time.

calm.description: Steady nerves restore a bit of vitality each round.

cold.description: Chilled air numbs reflexes and hampers reactions.

concentration.description: Maintaining focus to sustain a power; losing focus ends the effect.

confused.description: Disoriented and uncertain, making it hard to act.

drowsy.description: Sleepiness weighs you down, reducing your effectiveness.

hidden.description: Obscured from view, harder for enemies to target you.

ignited.description: You are ablaze, taking ongoing thermal damage.

injured.description: Sustained harm slows your movements and actions.
